#summary How to install required lib to run the backend branch
#labels Phase-Support

= Get Source Code=
{{{
svn checkout http://pwytter.googlecode.com/svn/branches/backend_split/ pwytter-qt
}}}

for registered developper
{{{
svn checkout https://pwytter.googlecode.com/svn/branches/backend_split/ pwytter-qt --username your.user.name
}}}

= Windows Install =
==Mandatory==
  * [http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt/download pyQT]
  * [http://pyyaml.org/ PyYAML]
==Optional==
  * if you need Qt documentaion: QT install http://www.qtsoftware.com/downloads

= Run Pwytter =
{{{
python main.pyw
}}}
